Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ModelUpdateHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ModelUpdateHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CLIModelUpdateHandler, GUIModelUpdateHandler
public abstract class ModelUpdateHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Class responsible of handling the updates that are received from the server.

  • Method Details

    • getView

      public View getView()
      Gets the View.
      Returns:
      the view

    • updateGamePhase

      public void updateGamePhase​(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Updates the gamePhase. The different states in which the game can be are: GamePhase.SELECTING_LEADERS, GamePhase.PLAYING, GamePhase.END.
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - The different states in which the game can be are: GamePhase.SELECTING_LEADERS, GamePhase.PLAYING, GamePhase.END

    • handleInitialTurn

      public void handleInitialTurn​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.Map<LeaderCard,​java.lang.Boolean> leaderCards, int resourceToChoose)
      Handles the initial turn update, setting the LeaderCards and the quantity of resources that the player is allowed to choose in the first turn.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player of this update
      leaderCards - the leader cards
      resourceToChoose - the number od resources to choose

    • updateLeaderCards

      public void updateLeaderCards​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.Map<LeaderCard,​java.lang.Boolean> ownedLeaders)
      Updates the LeaderCards of the given player if his GamePhase is GamePhase.PLAYING.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the given player
      ownedLeaders - a map representing the LeaderCards owned by the given player GamePhase.PLAYING, with a boolean attribute that indicates if the LeaderCard is active

    • updateDevelopmentCards

      public void updateDevelopmentCards​(java.lang.String playerName, DevelopmentCard card, int slot)
      Updates the development cards of the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the given player
      card - the development card to set
      slot - the slot in which the development card will be set

    • updateTurn

      public void updateTurn​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Updates the turn of the given player. The states of the game are GameState.CONNECTING, GameState.PLAYING, GameState.SELECT_LEADERS, GameState.WAIT_SELECT_LEADERS, GameState.STARTING, GameState.CHOOSING_NAME, GameState.CHOOSING_PLAYERS.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to update the turn

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket​(int index, java.util.List<Resource> changes, Resource slideResource)
      Updates a row or column of the market with the resources given.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the row or column to update
      changes - the updated row or column of the market
      slideResource - the resource to be put in the slide

    • updateDeposit

      public void updateDeposit​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> changes, java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.List<Resource>> leadersDeposit)
      Updates the deposit of a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose deposit needs to be updated.
      changes - a map representing the new deposit of the player after the updated is made
      leadersDeposit - a map representing the new deposit of the leaders of the player after the updated is made

    • updateStrongbox

      public void updateStrongbox​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.Map<Resource,​java.lang.Integer> strongbox)
      Updates the StrongBox of the given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose strongbox needs to be updated
      strongbox - a Map representing the new strongbox of the player after the update is made

    • updateFaith

      public void updateFaith​(java.lang.String playerName, int faithPoints)
      Updates the faithPoints of a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose faith points need to be updated
      faithPoints - an integer representing the new number of faith points after the update is made

    • updatePopeFavours

      public void updatePopeFavours​(java.lang.String playerName, int popeFavours)
      Updates the popeFavours of a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose pope favours need to be updated
      popeFavours - an integer representing the new number of pope favours after the update is made

    • updateChat

      public void updateChat​(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String message)
      Updates the chat.
      Parameters:
      sender - the name of the sender of the message
      message - a string representing the message written by the player

    • insertDrawnResources

      public void insertDrawnResources​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.List<Resource> result)
      Inserts the resources drawn from the market by a given player.
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose drawn resources need to be stored
      result - a list representing the resources to store

    • handleLorenzoAction

      public void handleLorenzoAction​(LorenzoAction action)
      Handles an action from the singleplayer opponent.
      Parameters:
      action - the action of the opponent
